year.column_description: 4-digit year value (e.g., '2023', '2024'). Part of primary key. Used for year-over-year comparisons and annual reporting.

quarter.column_description: Quarter identifier: 'Q1', 'Q2', 'Q3', or 'Q4'. Represents the fiscal quarter. Used for quarterly analysis and forecasting.

month.column_description: Full month name (e.g., 'January', 'February', 'March'). Part of primary key. Used for monthly trend analysis and period comparisons.

week.column_description: Week number within the period. String value representing week of quarter/month. Used for weekly granularity in forecasting and linearity analysis.

region.column_description: Geographic region code. Valid values: 'APJC' (Asia Pacific, Japan, China), 'Americas' (North and South America), 'EMEA' (Europe, Middle East, Africa). Used for geographic segmentation and regional performance analysis.

segment.column_description: Business segment classification. Examples: 'Cloud & AI Infra', 'Security & Observability', 'Networking', 'Internet Infra', 'Collab & Customer Eng'. Used to categorize revenue by product/service line.

qtd.column_description: QTD (Quarter-to-Date) revenue - cumulative revenue from the start of the current quarter through the specified week. Decimal value in currency units. Represents actual revenue booked, not forecast.

commit.column_description: Committed forecast revenue - high-confidence revenue expected to close. Decimal value in currency units. Typically represents 80-90% confidence level in sales forecasting. Used for revenue planning.

upside.column_description: Upside revenue - potential additional revenue beyond committed forecast. Decimal value in currency units. Represents lower-confidence opportunities that could materialize. Used for scenario planning.

cisco_stage_app.qtd_commit_upside.comment: Tracks quarterly forecasting metrics including QTD (Quarter-to-Date revenue), committed forecast revenue, and potential upside revenue. Contains weekly aggregated data by region and business segment. Used for sales forecasting, revenue planning, and forecast accuracy analysis. Updated weekly.
